entry.title: Career_history
entry.content: ## Topics - **Career history:** - Previous work and projects relevant to Nuritas. - **Position profile:** - How I believe my experience and background will be a good fit. - **Ideas:** - Concepts and ideas that I believe might be of interest for the role. --- ### Career history. College ! Biology | Data Science :-------------------------:|:-------------------------: | BSc Genetics (UCC) 2010, MSc Immunology and Global Health (NUIM) 2012 | HDip Data Science and Analytics (CIT) (2014) -- - **_BSc Genetics 2010_** - Genomics, Bioinformatics, Statistics, Molecular biology. - Final year project in bioinformatics (investigating bacterial pseudogenes in failed horizontal gene transfer events) -- - **_MSc Immunology and Global Health 2012_** - Epidemiology and disease modelling, molecular immunology, proteomics/bioinformatics. - Master thesis. Preperation of a genomic library of a virulent e-coli strain known to be associated with Crohn's disease in humans. -- - **_HDip Data Science and Analytics 2014_** - Mathematics, statistics, distributed computing, Python and R programming, machine learning. - Thesis. Sentiment analysis and opinion mining of Twitter using a Naive Bayes classifier. -- Twitter Sentiment Analysis on real time data. Gave some presentations in Cork and received a job offer at Xanadu consultancy. --- ### Career history. College ! ##### Experience working in data science - I joined Xanadu consultancy in 2014 as a Data Scientist. - Initally worked in the "Data Analytics" team (2 years). - Then worked in "Data Products" team (>9 months). -- ##### Example of some projects I worked on at Xanadu ##### Data Analytics Team at Xanadu - Haproxy log files - setup processes in MongoDB, later Google Bigquery - R package for data analytics team - Personalization (twitter, commissions) - Migration - Many other data projects, including fraud detection, LTV, Churn etc. - Prices analytics (NFTN tool). -- ##### Data Products Team at Xanadu (~ 9 months) - Bonus engine - The above image is for a 50 (% fragment %} - sdsdsds - Prices analytics (NFTN tool V2). -- Working holiday visa in New Zealand and working as a Business analyst / Data Scientist. - Business analytics - The above image is for a 50 (% fragment %} - sdsdsds - Prices analytics (NFTN tool V2). --- ### Career history. ##### Recap and how I feel some of the projects are relevant to Nuritas ! ##### I feel I have a strong background in bioligcal sciences and informatics.
